website_summaries.verdict: Use dry erase markers or included magnets to mark this  hanging chore chart. Easily remove one name plate if you have a 2-child family.
pros: Hang from nail or hook on a wall
Designed for up to 3 children, but extra name plates are removable
Can mark with magnetic stars or dry erase markers
Rewards are featured near the top
cons: It can be challenging to remove the magnetic stars from the packaging
They may slip off the board when bumped

customer_reviews.title: Buy it! ...Use it!
customer_reviews.text: We're using this as an "earned screen time" reward chart. Each color star is worth a different amount of time (yellow 10 min, green 15, and orange 20). Then they can cash in their stars for screen time...or save them up for something special. I'm loving that they are doing their stuff by just looking at the chart without my asking and I'm loving not arguing with them over their screen time. The magnetic stars are awesome! So glad they can be reused over and over unlike stickers. And it comes with I think 70 of each.
customer_reviews.author: JustaGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great concept but poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Board was bent slightly and so were the magnets so nothing lays flat. The magnets are not very strong and if you bump the chart things shift. Good idea, super cute and love that it's magnetically interchangeable but not the greatest quality.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: This chart is perfect!!! I love that you can add or remove the children name tags (up to 3 kids), as well as the chores. We use it currently for our 7 and 4 year old (our youngest isn’t of age just yet). this thing has been such a blessing! Our kids are excited to help and earn stars, but also make better decisions when they know the consequences of their choice might be that they have to take down a star! It has really helped with disciplining our children in constructive, calm ways. 100% recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Nice idea for tracking/teaching responsibility.
customer_reviews.text: Good concept. Quality is ok. Mine was missing the marker, I checked the description again and it says it comes with the board and marker. Luckily, I had purchased others anyway. The board is kinda bent, which doesn't affect it much except for trying to magnet my straight marker on it...depending on where you put it it kinda falls off and/or slips down since it isn't flush.
customer_reviews.author: JnK W.

customer_reviews.title: My child won't stop cleaning! 😂
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this. My daughter started doing chores and other responsibilities expected of her as soon as we got it set up. Two things that I wish I could change....I wish there were a couple more options for types of chores/responsibilities or a couple of blank ones to write in your own. Also, the mount that holds the dry erase markers lost its sticky grip to the magnet that holds it up the very first day. That was an easy super glue fix though. She asked me to mention that she wishes it came in pink lol. Seriously not complaining, just honest feedback 😁 Thank y'all!
customer_reviews.author: DaughteroftheMostHigh

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had this sooner
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have ordered this a year ago. After 11 years of teaching and becoming a stay at home mom, I wondered how I could control almost 30 4th graders and not my own 2 children. Hard to admit but the truth. I wanted some way they could feel accountable for some chores while also keeping behavior in check. My two are 3 and 4 and love putting their stars up at the end of every day, counting how many they have and working towards a goal every week. Hint of advice, hang it higher than little hands can grab. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Overall good
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old loves earning his stars to get a reward! It's helped with his attitude a ton. I thought the board itself would be magnetic to stay on the fridge. It's too heavy to use the string with a separate magnet, so I had to command-strip it to the fridge. The stars are constantly falling with the slightest bump or brush - the magnets aren't super strong, which I get because it's made for kids, but I do wish they were a little more magnet-y. Lots of good chores/responsibilities come on the magnets already and I like that you can write in your own. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: kb1989

customer_reviews.title: Durable and high quality!
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality product that encourages good behavior. My older son is really into getting his stars! While i have 2 boys, i used a chart for 1 kid so i could create tiers for rewards. My younger son is 2 so he isn’t quite ready yet. The product comes with 3 reward tiles, so i have 1 reward for if he gets 10 stars in a day, a star in every category each day, and a weekly. The foam is pretty thick and well constructed so i think this will last us a good while.
customer_reviews.author: Longhorn99

customer_reviews.title: Hazardous Materials no return thin few chore options
customer_reviews.text: So the item came warped. It is very thin and costs more than the Melissa and Doug wood one with less chore options. When I went to return, it said it cannot be returned due to HAZARDOUS materials. I called Amazon and they refunded me but did verify they cannot take it back due to hazards of the materials used. Please do not get this for your kids.
customer_reviews.author: Klee81

customer_reviews.title: A+ in my book!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and kid friendly. I love it. I highly Reccomend. I’d buy again if I needed it. So if you think positive reinforcement and creating a sense of accomplishment and self worth will help your child gain confidence and control then this is for you. U can use it for one child or multiple. Magnets are thick. The board itself is one huge magnet but can also be hung up if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Makes things so much easier
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my two little boys. I tried doing different methods to get teach them to help out or clean up after they were done playing and this one seems to work perfectly. They love looking at how many stars they are earning everyday. If there is a set back I’ll take a star and they have to earn it again. It’s been one week and having this board has made things so much easier. Really glad I chose this and it’s great bc everything is magnetic. Really happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough good things about this! We had the Melissa and Doug wooden one previously and liked it enough, but you couldn't customize the chores. With this chart you can just write with the dry erase markers what you want in a spot. The magnets are great, but do make me a little nervous with having a one year old in the house. I just make sure to keep it up high and the pieces up too. Overall this is an amazing product and seems to be working!
customer_reviews.author: Camilla L. Britt

customer_reviews.title: Working wonders!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this in last week and what a world of a difference it has made for my 9 and 10 year old. I havent asked them to do ONE chore since getting this. It's right on our fridge so there's no excuse for them not to see it. And their incentive is $10 a month if all chores are completed everyday. Love this product and would definitely reccomend it to friends!
customer_reviews.author: Ptmama

customer_reviews.title: It’s a ST ⭐️ R in my book!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Great quality and wonderful early responsibility check points. I have a 6 yr old, 3 yr old, & 19 month old & they are all obsessed with earning stars. They each selected the “prize” for the week and were excited to earn it. Even our baby is putting her clothes in the hamper and the older two are now in the habit of making their bed every day. I love how it is positive with responsibilities rather than the old school term of “doing chores”. It’s wonderful for positive reinforcement and creating helpful habits. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Waxberg

customer_reviews.title: ... a week in and so far our 3 kids love this and are trying to get as many stars ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure the enthusiasm will wear off but we're a week in and so far our 3 kids love this and are trying to get as many stars as possible. My 7 year old says "I like it because it is way to get more money to buy stuff".... Good motivation for good behavior. I like the magnetic stars and the pre-printed tasks and the fact that I can also write in tasks.
customer_reviews.author: mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: overall great, just don't count on the pen/marker
customer_reviews.text: great board, like how it allows you to customize. Only complaint was that the pen would not stay on the board. It had a magnet that wouldn't stay in the plastic holder so we hot glued it, and then it seemed like it was almost too heavy and kept falling off, now I have no clue where the pen is
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple, reliable, and customizable
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly the simple but customizable chart system I was looking for! The magnets are stronger than I expected for the price. The foam stars are so cute, everyone loves them. I’m currently using some of the pre-made “chore” magnets, and wrote in the rest of the kids’ responsibilities with the marker (which wipes right back off with ease). Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Green

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect chart for any family
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect chart for any family. It’s simple and keeps everyone on track. I also love that it leaves room to customize it to your family needs. The kids also enjoy seeing their color coded stars being put up when ever they have completed a chore, it makes it fun for them. Also another plus with the Roscoe chart is that I canhave up to three kids on it. Most charts only leave room for two!
customer_reviews.author: mother goose

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Visual
customer_reviews.text: This chart is absolutely perfect. I was looking for something for my two littles that would serve as a visual for the tasks they completed throughout the day. This chart works great. Everything is magnetic so you can choose what you want displayed. They love it and look forward to earning stars.
customer_reviews.author: Customerjcb

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This chart reminds my Pre-K son on his responsibility to get as many stars as he can so he can be rewarded. The only thing I wish would be to send some blank magnets so we could write a couple of our own. I would like to have had Manners and Dress Yourself on a magnet. I made labels for a couple of the magnets I didn't use and put my own label on the ones I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Aline

customer_reviews.title: Greatest chart I've seen!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this charting system. I have been making my own each week because there were no charts that worked. My daughter's clinicians thought this was one of the best they had seen. It can be used for up to three kids but I am using it with three rewards. This is heavy duty with extra thick stars. Love the bag that comes with it to hold any pieces you aren't using.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene D.

customer_reviews.title: Colorful innovative chart
customer_reviews.text: Great tool for motivating the right kind of behavior. The tiles dont stick very well after a while and are unable to withstand little hands damage. Stars also start peeling off the magnetic backs after a bit. It has been great for us though.
customer_reviews.author: Asie Arkhurst

customer_reviews.title: Every parent needs this chart
customer_reviews.text: I have three small kids that are going to be on summer break soon. I knew I was going to need to give them some chores for the summer and was looking for a good chore chart. I seen this and looking at the comments I figured my kids would love it. Let me just say, I recommend this chart for all parents! My kids have been doing all of their chores and tasks and always look forward to me putting the stars on the chart at the end of the day. The kids can easily see their name and what their goal is. This chart is also perfect for parents who have children that don’t want to listen.
customer_reviews.author: Dinah Goins

customer_reviews.title: My son likes it
customer_reviews.text: It’s a pain to get the stars out and ready. Other than that, this board is wonderful. So much better than the one I’ve had before. My son is more willing to help without much complaining when it comes to chores he doesn’t typically like doing. It’s also absolutely wonderful not having to fight him to brush his teeth!!!
customer_reviews.author: Calico Kitten

customer_reviews.title: great help, cute tool
customer_reviews.text: I could not believe how my kids reacted toward this chart: they absolutely love it and it really made a difference in their involvement with house chores - it's been over a month and their interest has sustained, even my 10 yo!
customer_reviews.author: Momof4

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I opened the box to find that my purchased product was not as described.. i am missing the most important part of the tool.. the individual goal magnets where we put the names and the rewards and no marker .. which makes the piece very useless!!! But I received the chart and the magnetic stars along with the activity magnets.. I was so excited but Now im not at all happy!!!
customer_reviews.author: RaniaAK

customer_reviews.title: It’s worling great!
customer_reviews.text: My kids are loving it so far (a week in). It’s getting them more involved in household duties and getting them more eager to do things on their own (brush their teeth, help wih the pets, put their clothes in the hamper, etc). My kids are 3 and 5-1/2 and I see this is working for several years to come. :) I love that you can personalize the tasks too.
customer_reviews.author: Babyruth0101

customer_reviews.title: I think it will show my twin 4 year olds a little responsibility
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars will update further updates if needed. Packaged ok. But dent in bottom. Not that big of deal for me as my Twins will probably damage also. Magnets could be stronger and there are not that many specific titles for the responsibilities. Honestly a piece of masking tape for additional items is what I’m going to do. You can write in items using the dry erase marker but it will get wiped away pretty easy.
customer_reviews.author: J. B.

customer_reviews.title: Helping our boy get some focus
customer_reviews.text: This chart has helped our 4 year old get some focus. Since he is our only kiddo here, we used all three slots for him; 10 stars he gets a special treat, 20 he gets to go to the water park, 100 he gets to go visit his aunty in another town. It helps him care a bit more about hitting the water when he goes.... among other things.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Brown

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to use for our 3 year old. We’ve only had the chart for a couple days but she seems to enjoy it. Quality is good, dry erase marker works well, and magnetic stars/responsibilities stick to board well. 😄
customer_reviews.author: Amanda010

customer_reviews.title: Great chart!
customer_reviews.text: This chart is excellent. It's magnets are really high quality and thick. The board itself can hang and the starts come with a bag for safe keeping. The marker clips right onto the board. You can fill in your own items as well as use the ones provided. Using this chart has given my daughter something to look forward to and goals to reach. Her behavior has improved tremendously. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: carrie kelly

customer_reviews.title: perfect product for a single child
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this to help my boy remember to help around the house and do his homework etc. He's 11 years old but has working memory and executive functioning issues. we don't have a magnetic fridge, so this was great because I can hang it on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: This is a sturdy, well made product
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy, well made product. I was a little concerned after reading some of the reviews, but it arrived in good shape and the magnets stick well. My kids love the colorful stars, and the dry erase marker is a nice addition.
customer_reviews.author: MCB

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Useful Star Chart
customer_reviews.text: My family has been looking for a chore/star/reward chart for a while. This is the first one we have purchased, and our initial impression is fantastic. Our children, 7 & 5 years of age, were excited to sit down as a family and create our chart. The pre-printed tasks got us off to a great start, and the blank spaces allowed us to personalize the chart to meet our needs. So far, the kids are responding in a positive manner, and we are pleased with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Marooba

customer_reviews.title: Great Chart for Kids
customer_reviews.text: I love that the stars are magnetic so I’m not dealing with stickers and having to re-make charts all the time. My 7-year-old is able to see and track his progress through the week so he is accountable to himself. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Greeson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: She loves doing this chart, I only have 1 child so I just write star goal on the top. The stars are thick and the board is very well made. I love that it comes with a bag for the stars and chore tabs.
customer_reviews.author: Maegan

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly versatile!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this magnetic chart. We have 3 kids, but are only using it for the oldest 2 right now. However, we will add #3 when he gets older. I like that we can use the magnetic chores included as well as write in our own. The magnets are powerful enough and my boys like placing the stars after completing their chores. The goal magnet is also very helpful in incentivising the kiddos. Overall, we are very happy with this chart!
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Stronger than I thought
customer_reviews.text: I have girls 4 and 8 years old. You have the option of writing your own targeted behaviors or using their pre-made magnets with pictures on them. The stars are magnetic and very sturdy. The board as big and strong, but a bit heavy to hang on the refrigerator. Very nice, pleased so far.
customer_reviews.author: Butter fingers

customer_reviews.title: Works great with my 7 year old twins!
customer_reviews.text: If you set realistic goals for the age of your child(ren) you will be amazed at how they fight to help with the laundry, trash, dishes, feeding the dogs, picking up toys, etc! We found whomever reaches 15 stars by Friday gets a treat after school - they call it fun Friday.
customer_reviews.author: Clove2007

customer_reviews.title: The stars stick on nicely, the board itself is thick and heavy
customer_reviews.text: The stars stick on nicely, the board itself is thick and heavy. The provided responsibility magnets are good as well. It has a thick string holding it around two holes. The magnets are of decent quality and it comes with a dry erase marker. My kid likes the chart as well.
customer_reviews.author: Dakkon

customer_reviews.title: The star magnets were smaller than I expected but work great in the space
customer_reviews.text: It fits what I wanted but it was little different than how I understood it to be. I was hoping for more magnets that I could write on as opposed to writing directly on the board. The star magnets were smaller than I expected but work great in the space.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri C

customer_reviews.title: Awesome magnetic star chart
customer_reviews.text: In the first week of using this with my 6 year old and we are loving it. We are having behavior problems and telling her to think about her stars helps! Would buy again seems to be working! Love that the stars are magnetic and reusable
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our family!
customer_reviews.text: I've heard it before, blah blah blah star charts work. I just rolled my eyes. Finally bought one and admit it works! I liked this one because I have three children and it came with the chores preprinted, so is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Tsin Chiu

customer_reviews.title: I looked for a while for the perfect chore chart and debated on making my own
customer_reviews.text: I looked for a while for the perfect chore chart and debated on making my own. There are a lot out there but every one would be missing something I wanted on the chart. This checked every box I wanted and had the additional I didn’t even know I wanted (eat healthy food!). My son loves it and so do I.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Something all parents needs for their kids!
customer_reviews.text: Just the thing we were looking for. As soon as we opened it. We put it up and the kids were busy doing chores. Which made our lives easier. Thank you Roscoe for providing us with an easy to use product. Not only do we love it but th kids as well. It also will help in teaching the kids about responsibility as well as working for things that they want and need. Will be looking at other products from them.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Colonna

customer_reviews.title: Useful but hard to erase
customer_reviews.text: I made own subjects - once our kid achieved, we erased and changed to new topics. Even one night passed, it didn t remove easily so I really have to add a bit of water to scrub- which was a big pain though we liked this other than that.
customer_reviews.author: New Yorker

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for a positive result
customer_reviews.text: This responsibility chart is the best! We have 2 children (4&5 yrs old). It’s basically as guide of our day with a reward given for the things we have traditionally found challenging. (Dressing quickly, drinking water, etc) It gives us a stopping point in the day to model positive behavior. My only desire is for it to be a wee bit larger. I plan to purchase another as our kids have different focuses. It’s has been nothing but a success! I was also impressed with the quality & with magnets that actually work.
customer_reviews.author: lisa woodland

customer_reviews.title: Wish the back of this was more sturdy - it's cardboard and a little warped
customer_reviews.text: Wish the back of this was more sturdy - it's cardboard and a little warped. The rest is great. Hanging the board itself off the string looks crappy, especially with the warping. Wish it was sturdier and had better hanging option.
customer_reviews.author: HARRINGTON'S of Maine

customer_reviews.title: We are really happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: We are really happy with this product. It fits our family's needs perfectly, as it allows for more than one child and you can write in chores that fit your family, as well as the provided chore magnets. The magnets are strong and stay really well. They are also thick and durable. I would recommend this to anyone looking fit a product like this.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Fun and sturdy reward chart!
customer_reviews.text: This chart is a nice size and very sturdy. I love that it came with a string to hang it and the colors are fun and bright. The tasks and stars are magnets and seem to stay attached pretty well. My only complaint is that the pen hold keeps falling off the magnet but that isn't a huge deal to me. We used this for my son all weekend and he loves it as much as we do!
customer_reviews.author: Jess B.

customer_reviews.title: Resposability chart
customer_reviews.text: we just started the chart my kids are 4 and 2 and they are loving it. My 4 year old a little more than the 2 year old but they love asking whats next on the chart. She loves the ideal of setting her own reword. Its kind of neat you can use it a few different ways. We use it so they know what they need to be doing next to get ready for the day. As they get older I can change it with the chores they are expected to get done.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Within the first day of using this, it changed the atmosphere at my house. I was having disciplinary issues, and by working in a climate of posted rules and rewards versus an atmosphere of punishment for bad behavior, everything has changed. It is so easy to use and for children to understand and have something to work towards. I love that you can pick from predefined tasks or create your own. I cannot say enough about this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy with this chart. The stars are thick and stay on the chart. It also came with a marker. It is well made. My kids love it too and are excited about doing their chores.
customer_reviews.author: F. T. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Reward
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my daughter it’s a great chart every time the chart is full of stars she gets a treat and she looks forward to doing her chores every day.
customer_reviews.author: Nikky

customer_reviews.title: A step up from sticker charts!
customer_reviews.text: This is also great for just one child. It helps my son to have a visual to help him focus on his tasks now that he’s turning into a big boy (7) with a busier schedule. And I set three different rewards- like earning screen time, a download, or a bonus deposit into his account- so that the “Mom, may I have...?” that I used to hear multiple times a day has stopped... for the most part.
customer_reviews.author: EK

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: At first I was scared to buy it when I found out it was foam but I'm glad I did the foam ★ are very sturdy and not cheaply made
customer_reviews.author: Usagi

customer_reviews.title: Stars for the win
customer_reviews.text: Great tool for my 4 year old learning how to do chores and collecting stars to earn prizes. I was having a hard time getting him to pick up toys, help me with chores... Now that I offer him a star he is motivated and actually asks what else he can do to earn more. It helped us turn a bad attitude into a helpful one.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, helpful chore chart for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: I love this for both my kids. I like that I can add in child specific chores and writing a goal has been very helpful when my kids ask how many more stars they need to earn until they get their prize
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my four year old niece. It's been super motivational, good for her to visualize and work towards earning stars. Magnets do fall off board pretty easily, but otherwise worth the $.
customer_reviews.author: David P.

customer_reviews.title: Helpful chart, damaged on arrival.
customer_reviews.text: So far the chart is serving it's purpose. So points for that. However, it arrived damaged. The marker that it came with was crushed and broken. It was in pieces when I opened the package. One of the corners is damaged as well. I didn't return the chart as I have a child with behavior issues that need to be addressed now. The damaged corner we can live and I can replace the marker. I would have given more stars if not for the damage. It occurred prior to packaging I believe as the box it arrived in was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: meagan p

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite item
customer_reviews.text: I bought it and I really did not like the material. End up not even using it. Found another option from Melissa and Doug in wood that looks much better.
customer_reviews.author: PLM

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! My kids love it and I love that their attitudes have improved towards chores and rewards.
customer_reviews.author: Alyson Love

customer_reviews.title: very nice board with heavy duty magnetic stars
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars because it was supposed to magnetize to the fridge but it doesn't. This one you have to hang on a wall. But overall a great deal and good concept for children to learn responsibility.
customer_reviews.author: thejoysofraisingboys

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, life-changing awesomeness
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing, and almost instantly made changes for the better in morning and night routines. The magnets are high quality, thick and sturdy. I honestly think it's a bit of a steal for the price. I'd give it six stars if it had even more options for chore magnets.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Katsouleris

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love the whole chart. The magnets are thick and sturdy. You can use the magnets they supply for responsibility choice or fill it in with what you want. Great product! The kids love earning stars for rewards.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This chart is #lifegoals!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely looooove this chart! I read complaints about the chart coming in damaged or missing items but ours came in perfect, thank you! Me and all my kids have ADHD, autism and other disorders and this helps ALL of us! This is not just for kids. If u struggle getting motivated or getting the kids morivated, then use it for a reward system at the end of the day/week. I also purchased a prize wheel seperately for the kids to spin to make it fun! Do urself a favor and buy it! It's worth the risk and you won't be dissapointed :)
customer_reviews.author: Mandi

customer_reviews.title: This chart is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I thought this chart could be good but I did not realize how great it would be! It’s all magnetic and several different chores. My son loves it and he wants to earn his stars. He has started doing chores again because of this chart. The only thing that is missing in my opinion is a couple blank tiles so you can write in your own. Great product 💯
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed by the overall quality of the board and the magnetic accessories. My daughter is 4 1/2 and took a liking to the chart immediately. The chores it comes with are exactly what I want her to help out with but i like that you have the option to write in custom ones as well. I am very satisfied with the purchase. Thank you! :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is EXACTLY what I was looking for, the product came in a nice box of its own. I love it! Everything is magnetic, which is so nice! If your looking for a chore chart, don’t hesitate.. buy this one!
customer_reviews.author: K L

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love how it gets my kids more interested in doing more around the house. It's getting to the point they don't even ask for the star they see me doing something and ask to help or go with me.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: The kids love earning stars toward their next reward
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 children and I wanted a way to remind them of chores and such without always asking. The kids love earning stars toward their next reward. So far cleanup and bedtime have been easier. Less whining about cleanup and more just picking up with a question of did I earn my star. Yep I'm bribing them but it's temp as they get better about some things I'll switch up to others. My kids are 5 so the pictures help since they are not reading yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love how customizable this board is, from the chores to the reward at the end of the week). Some of the premade chores are not in the right age range for my kids, but they'll be new and exciting when it's time to add them. My kids and I love this (they have me participate, too, haha). The only con in my mind is that the week runs Monday through Sunday instead of Sunday to Saturday.
customer_reviews.author: Kati_Hud

customer_reviews.title: Great chart! It has all the chores I need ...
customer_reviews.text: Why didn't I think of this earlier? Great chart! It has all the chores I need and then some and more than enough stars. If you don't like the chores provided, just write in your own. My kids (ages 6 and 8) love it and look at the chart daily to see if there is anything else left they can do to earn a star. I highly recommend this product. It's exactly what I wanted and what I so desperately needed. It's worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: marija puric

customer_reviews.title: Love this chart for the fact I can customize it ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this chart for the fact I can customize it and have multiple children on one chart. It's good quality. My only wish is that the chart itself was magnetic to put in my fridge but that doesn't change how much I really love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Structure is great for any kid, this chart helps with visually stimulating a young mind to see their work accomplished and be proud of themselves. Great buy for anyone with a growing child.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Genius and Interactive
customer_reviews.text: My five year old son now proactively does things off the chart in order to earn a star. His behavior And willingness to do things has significantly improved since we started the star chart. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Karl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect star chart for our 4 year old. Helps with teaching children responsibility and goals with positive reinforcement. Board is magnetic, 10 spots for responsibilities, needs an eraser.
customer_reviews.author: E. S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my nieces and it's the best chart. It helped with behavior and chores. And jos love being able to put the own star up when n they completed a task.
customer_reviews.author: Joy & Christina

customer_reviews.title: I would give a 10 if I could!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome board! Awesome customer service! I would recommend 110% my kids are both so motivated with this fun board! I love the fact that you can write in your own tasks. The magnetic stars are super cute and the baggie makes it super easy to keep track of!
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Love this chart!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our 5 year old daughter to help her be more motivated to help around the house with little chores and our puppy. We love it and she has done so well with it. She gets so excited to put her stars on the board and she makes her bed, cleans her room, and brushes her teeth all before she leaves for school in the morning without us saying a word to her about it!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Holloway

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old loves his chart and motivates him to do things himself vs me asking him to do things over and over.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it!
customer_reviews.text: So adorable. My kids ages 4 & 7 took to this right away. I love that there's a couple of slots free to list my own chore, or in our case rule- no fighting! Overall great product. Don't let the price deter you.
customer_reviews.author: zimbobway

customer_reviews.title: great options for personalizing and tons of magnets
customer_reviews.text: This is great quality product. More than I really expected. Good size for handwriting and options for personalizing
customer_reviews.author: ronald m egan

customer_reviews.title: Great way to teach responsibility
customer_reviews.text: My kids, 7 and 3 both love the ideal of getting stars and then recieving an allowance for recieving stars.
customer_reviews.author: Celesta

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my almost 3 year old to get her excited about brushing her teeth and helping with chores. Once she completes one chore she asks me what else she can do for a star. Great quality! Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great chart. Kids like it.
customer_reviews.text: Great chart. It is nice that it is laminated and has a string to hang it on the wall. Kids love it so far. Took away one star because the marker’s magnet fell of in less than a weeks
customer_reviews.author: Smclean17

customer_reviews.title: Great, but...
customer_reviews.text: We use this every day in our home. It's great! I just wish it had a magnet backing for chart to put it on the side of the refrigerator. Its slightly heavier than expected and does not hang without sliding to side to side while using it.
customer_reviews.author: HRM

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy!
customer_reviews.text: This has helped immensely! I added big magnets to the back to stick on to the fridge. It has definitely helped our morning routine.
customer_reviews.author: Leanna Pezzini

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: I searched many do-it-yourself ways to make a chart and when I came across this one, it had it all. I am using it for my special needs stepdaughter who cannot read very well. The illustrations are wonderful as well as having the choice to write/draw in other chores/activities. She is so excited to use this chart and I can tell that something as simple as this is going to simplify our lives tremendously. Thank you so much!!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie D Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Great motivational tool
customer_reviews.text: Love this reward chart just as much as my daughter. She loves punching out her stars and applying them. She’s definitely a lot more motivated to complete tasks now. The chart is sturdy and the stars stick on with no issues. This is a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Krystle C

customer_reviews.title: Fun and functional!
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it, hopefully the chores get done with less parental instruction. Good quality, hope that it lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany R.

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this to parents who wants to train their children ...
customer_reviews.text: This is helping my children to learn they must earn their points to receive rewards and this also provide structure for them. If they forgot what they need to go, they can go back and review the star chart. I highly recommend this to parents who wants to train their children how to become more organized.
customer_reviews.author: Selah Davison

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use , fun
customer_reviews.text: Very good chart .fun and easy to use but could use more relevant tags, but you can always your own
customer_reviews.author: Cory Magnuson

customer_reviews.title: Used item
customer_reviews.text: The item I received was damaged and had previously been used.
customer_reviews.author: Webb

customer_reviews.title: Great product and has a great purpose
customer_reviews.text: This chart has helped my daughter so much, it has made her so independent and she always wants to do stars!
customer_reviews.author: avery

customer_reviews.title: I love it kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: My kids are doing all of their chores now thanks to this chart! Love the magnetic stars and the kids love it! Great purchase! Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Zipp

customer_reviews.title: Learn responsibly and goal setting with positive reinforcement!
customer_reviews.text: My kids loves the opportunity to earn stars and a bigger goal. Helping my kids learn responsibly and goal setting. Plus creates a much more positive energy in the house. Instead of threatening them if you don’t eat dinner or brush your teeth... I am praising them all to success.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: My kiddos love their helper chart. We've had this system for 2 weeks and each kids has claimed their favorite color stars. They write and re-write their names and they have come up with their own "chores" to do(which they can customize and write on the board directly since it is dry erase). This chart is everything I hoped it would be and more.
customer_reviews.author: RMadison

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase. Very helpful
customer_reviews.text: This really helped with my kids morning routine and listening to me. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsey Peters

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely impressed with this product!! Magnets are very thick and durable and the board is nice and thick. My 3 year old son is more motivated to earn stars and has been reading more, will not fuss when washing his hair in the bath, and wants to brush his teeth all day!! Great for positive reinforcement and behavior modification!
customer_reviews.author: Nellie

product_meta.title: Roscoe Learning Responsibility Star Chart | Customize for 1-3 Kids | Magnetic Chore Reward System
product_meta.description:
The Roscoe Learning Responsibility Star Chart set helps develop responsibility, goal setting, and co-operation in young children. Designed to address the weaknesses found in other products, our set is the direct result of feedback from hundreds of parents and caregivers. Easy to customize for use as a chore, behavior, incentive, reward, or responsibility chart.

 Each set includes:

 1- Dry erase chart and marker. The colorful design is printed on a long lasting dry erase covering. Measuring 16.5 x 13.5 inches, our board is larger than other brands which provides a less crowded space for tracking progress. Use the color coordinated cord to hang it from a nail, hook, or doorknob. The chart is magnetic, and will stick to a refrigerator door or other metal surface.

 3 – Individual goal magnets. Customize the chart for 1-3 children. Each magnet displays the child’s name, their desired reward, and the number of stars that must be earned for success. Our system allows you to remove unused name magnets from the board so the chart is truly customized for YOUR children.

 12 - Illustrated activity and chore magnets. Each magnet has an illustration and printed text describing a common task or chore. Illustrations allow young non-readers to be reminded of their daily tasks (and we think they are cuter than plain text).

 210 – Colorful foam magnetic reward stars in three colors. Our star magnets are made of thicker foam and have stronger magnets than other brands. The thick foam makes them easier for small hands to manage and the thick magnets keep them in place. Other brands use thin magnets that end up on the floor and can be a choking hazard.

 1 – Custom sized storage bag for loose pieces. Our cotton bag is custom sized to hold all 225 magnets AND the dry erase marker. No more unsightly pieces scattered all about.

 Model: SC01201
feature_bullets: BUILDS RESPONSIBILITY – Helps children set goals and work toward achieving them. Visual rewards help children track progress and share their success with you!
CUSTOMIZABLE - Includes three individual goal magnets that can be added or removed to fit your family. No need to have empty name boxes displayed on the reward chart.

SAFER PIECES – All reward stars have a full 1mm thick magnetic backing to stay in place on the board. Other brands use thin magnets that allow pieces to fall to floor and become a hazard for pets and children.
ILLUSTRATED TASK MAGNETS – Illustrations help non-readers remember what responsibilities they have. Includes twelve printed and illustrated magnets for common tasks and chores.

MAGNETIC DRY ERASE CHART – Durable dry erase chart solidly holds responsibility magnets, or you can use the included marker to write in your own chores and responsibilities. Easy to hang on a wall or stick to a refrigerator.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,013 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
